title: Lag/dropped frames during game despite good internet speeds
body:
Recently I have been getting huge lag spikes during game, it will happen every couple minutes where my game will lag and I will basically lose connection from the game for 2-3 seconds. My internet speed is solid, when I download games on steam I get around 10 MB/s. It started when I moved back to my apartment after the holidays and nothing changed that I  know of while I was gone. Another symptom I get is I have trouble watching video streams like on twitch.tv. I think they may be related but I am unsure.

I have all the latest drivers, I have a gtx 770 and an i7 4770 with 16 gb of RAM. 

Any help is appreciated.

replies.body: It sounds like you've got either a week connection or some issue that's not communicating information back and forth smoothly.  Try out our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) issues guide to help troubleshoot, going over each step to rule out possibilities.  Test it out after in a custom game.  Let me know your results!

Thank you for the reply, I tried everything on there and still no improvement. I have no clue what the problem is, my connection seems fine but something is still wrong. http://imgur.com/a/lObPu      http://www.speedtest.net/my-result/5965191256

Thanks for trying!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help individually.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to attach some logs for more context.  We'll get back to you!
